full_summary:
====================================

**Title**
--------

K3D33-220878 Compressed Helium and Hydrogen Gas

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS3578632592-Doc3581675885

**Publication and Closing Dates**
-----------------------------

*   Published Date: March 12, 2024
*   Closing Date: March 28, 2024 at 14:00 EDT

**Status**
----------

*   Status: Cancelled

**Description of Requirements**
-----------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide compressed helium and hydrogen gas to the Department of the Environment (ECCC).

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

The gas will be delivered to the following locations:

*   Kapuskasing
*   Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information, please contact:

Tea, Richard (SPAC/PSPC)
richard.tea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: The contact's information is independent of the contractor who shared the original documentation thus I preferred to list this information as is to maintain the authenticity of the information. 

**How to Access the Tender Notice**
----------------------------------

The complete tender notice can be accessed through the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16121885?extsite=MTYxMjE4ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
